post.author: Inition
post.body: How do I set up the lightwave grid to equal that of Doom3? Lightwave is set to meters as default, can I change that to units? If I can change the units of measure too units, I'd assume changing the grid to 8 would work, thats what I did in gmax!

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
1 meter equals 1 unit.

For instance, the player is 72 units tall so in lightwave he is 72 meters tall.
